result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. William Alonzo Harmon

records.addlTxt:
Defendant William Alonzo Harmon appeared by video.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway appeared by video for William Alonzo Harmon.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defense requested a scheduling conference. Case adjourned to Branch 1.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant William Alonzo Harmon in court.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway in court for William Alonzo Harmon.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Status conference held.  Defendant has a new case and counsel needs to be appointed.  Atty. Padway requests a status date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant William Alonzo Harmon appeared by video.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway appeared by video for William Alonzo Harmon.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Defendant has a new case and counsel has not been appointed. Case is adjourned to Br. 1.
Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant William Alonzo Harmon in court.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. Court vacates previously authorized warrant. Indigency hearing proceeded.  Court makes a finding that defendant is indigent.  Court appoints Ethan Padway as counsel for defendant at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Attorney Padway accepts appointment.  Defendant shall reimburse Milwaukee County at the rate of $50.00 on the 1st of every month, commencing 9/1/22 until paid in full. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant William Alonzo Harmon not in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. Case set for pretrial conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 07-10-2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with TE.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant William Alonzo Harmon in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 1.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for William Alonzo Harmon
Current: 8871 North Swan Road #J, Milwaukee, WI 53224   (Effective: 07-08-2022)
Prior: 8871 North Swan Road, Milwaukee, WI 53224
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7-8-2022 @2p
